name: Wu Shuang 无双
description:
This is a multiplayer Kinect motion game you need a 360 Kinect V2 to run this game

please players stand 2 meters away from the screen.

Game setting: 
  •  Player One, The best assassin ninja trained under the Okami clan, has reached ever closer to ultimate victory. 
  • Player Two- the headmaster of the Izakaya clan - must do whatever it takes to ensure the safety of the cup noodles. 

Game control:

  • Two players stand side by side and face the screen. Kinect will detect your motions.
  • Crossed hands to block damages
  • The greater the action of the punch the higher the Shanghai
